description.create: Create a new organization to manage your stables

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone used for schedules and notifications

members.title: Organization Members
members.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or role...
members.emptyState: No members yet. Invite users to get started.
members.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove {{email}} from this organization?

removeMember.title: Remove Member
removeMember.confirmText: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this organization?
removeMember.checkingHorses: Checking for horses owned by this member...
removeMember.horseWarning: {{name}} owns {{count}} horse(s) that are currently stabled here. Please choose what should happen to these horses.
removeMember.whatShouldHappen: What should happen to the horses?
removeMember.transferToStableDescription: The horses become stable-owned. The organization will manage them.
removeMember.leaveWithMemberDescription: The member keeps their horses. They will be unassigned from the stable.
removeMember.failedDescription: An error occurred while removing the member. Please try again.
removeMember.transferFailedDescription: Could not transfer horse ownership. Please try again.
removeMember.successDescription: The member has been removed from the organization.

invite.title: Invite User to Organization
invite.description: Invite a new member to your organization and assign their roles
invite.inviteSent: Invitation sent to {{email}}. They will receive an email to join.
invite.alreadyMember: User is already a member of this organization
invite.alreadyInvited: An invitation has already been sent to this email address
invite.inviteFailed: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.

validation.roleRequired: At least one role must be selected

stable_manager.label: Stable Manager
stable_manager.description: Middle-management role for daily stable operations

schedule_planner.label: Schedule Planner
schedule_planner.description: Can create and manage routine selection processes

training_admin.label: Training Administrator
training_admin.description: Manages lesson schedules and training program

invites.title: Pending Invitations
invites.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation to {{email}}?
invites.forceActivateConfirm: Are you sure you want to force-activate {{count}} invitation(s)? This will create user accounts without passwords — users will need to use "Forgot password" to set their credentials.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: Role-based access control for organization members

matrix.title: Permission Matrix
matrix.description: Manage what each role can do in your organization
matrix.readOnlyDescription: Your subscription does not include custom permissions. Upgrade to a plan with advanced permissions to edit the matrix.

actions.manage_billing_settings: Manage invoice settings and payment terms
actions.manage_prices: Manage chargeable items and price list

buttons.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset permissions to their default values?

messages.protectedPermission: This permission cannot be removed from the administrator role

customRoles.title: Custom Roles & Advanced Permissions
customRoles.description: Available in Professional and Enterprise plans
customRoles.explanation: Customize permissions per role to match your organization's needs.
customRoles.specializedRoles: Specialized roles available: Veterinarian, Dentist, Farrier, Groom, Horse Owner, Rider, and more.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.pageDescription: Connect external services to extend your organization's capabilities

custom.title: Custom Integrations
custom.description: Build your own integrations using our API

manure.title: Manure Management
manure.description: Track manure removal and distribution across all stables

recentRecords.title: Recent Records
recentRecords.description: History of manure removal and distribution

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.pageDescription: Manage your subscription and billing information
subscription.currentPlanDescription: Your current subscription tier and features

trial.title: Trial Period
trial.description: Your subscription is currently in trial with all features. You have {{days}} days left to test all features.
trial.descriptionNoCard: Your trial is active with all features. You have {{days}} days left. Add a payment method before the trial ends to continue without interruption.

paused.title: Subscription paused
paused.description: Your trial has ended without a payment method on file. Add a payment method to resume your subscription.

pastDue.title: Payment failed
pastDue.description: Your last payment failed. Update your payment method to avoid interruptions.

canceling.title: Subscription ending
canceling.description: Your subscription will end on {{date}}. You have access to all features until then.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Starter subscription for basic stable management and routines.

essentials.name: Essentials
essentials.description: Essentials subscription with planning tools and shared routines.

stable.name: Stable
stable.description: Stable subscription for daily operations and staff coordination.

stable-plus.name: Stable Plus
stable-plus.description: Advanced subscription with analytics, scheduling, and permissions.

organization.name: Organization
organization.description: Organization subscription for multi-stable management and integrations.

history.title: Billing History
history.description: Your past invoices and payment history

success.title: Subscription activated!
success.description: Your subscription has been activated. Welcome!
success.processingDescription: Please wait while we confirm your payment.
success.timeoutTitle: Activation is taking longer than expected
success.timeoutDescription: Your payment was processed but activation is delayed. Your subscription will be activated shortly.

cancel.title: Checkout cancelled
cancel.description: You cancelled the checkout. No payment has been made.

featureGate.upgradeDescription: This feature requires the {{tier}} plan or higher.
featureGate.limitDescription: You have reached the limit for {{resource}} on your current plan.

upgrade.title: Upgrade to Stable Organization
upgrade.description: Your organization is currently a personal organization.
upgrade.personalLimitations: Personal organizations have limited features. Upgrade to invite members and share resources.
upgrade.benefitsTitle: As a stable organization you get access to:

benefits.members: Invite team members to help manage your stables
benefits.stables: Create multiple stables to organize your horses
benefits.contacts: Share contacts with your entire organization
benefits.roles: Assign roles and permissions to team members

upgrade.upgradeNote: Upgrading is free and permanent. Your organization will be converted to a stable organization.
upgrade.successDescription: Your organization has been upgraded to a stable organization. You can now invite members and create multiple stables.
upgrade.errorDescription: Failed to upgrade organization. Please try again.
upgrade.confirmDescription: You are about to upgrade your organization to a stable organization.
upgrade.confirmNote: This change is permanent and cannot be undone.

downgrade.title: Change to personal organization
downgrade.description: You are about to change your organization to a personal organization.
downgrade.warning: The following features will be hidden:
downgrade.note: Your data will not be deleted, but you will not be able to access these features until you upgrade again.
downgrade.successDescription: Your organization has been changed to a personal organization.

bulkImport.title: Bulk Import Members
bulkImport.description: Import multiple members at once from an Excel or CSV file

upload.dropzone: Drag and drop your file here, or click to browse
upload.hasHeadersTooltip: Enable this if the first row of your file contains column names like Email, Name, etc.
upload.googleSheetsTip: Tip: To import from Google Sheets, export as CSV first (File → Download → CSV)
upload.maxRowsDynamic: You can import up to {{max}} members ({{remaining}} of {{limit}} slots remaining)

errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {{max}}MB.
errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload an Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV file.
errors.emptyFile: The file appears to be empty.
errors.noDataRows: No data rows found. The file only contains headers.
errors.parseError: Could not parse the file. Please check the format.
errors.readError: Could not read the file. Please try again.
errors.memberLimitExceeded: Your file contains {{found}} members but you can only add {{remaining}} more (limit: {{limit}} members). Please reduce the number of rows in your file.
errors.submitFailed: Failed to submit import. Please try again.

mapping.description: Map your file columns to member fields. Email is required.

preview.globalRolesDescription: These roles will be assigned to all imported members unless overridden per row.
preview.sendInviteEmailsDescription: Send an email to each imported member with an invitation link.

validation.alreadyMember: Already a member of this organization
validation.missingName: Name is missing (will use email as display name)

confirmation.submittedDescription: Your import has been submitted and is being processed. You will receive a notification when it's complete.
confirmation.processingDescription: Members are being invited. This may take a moment.
confirmation.failedDescription: Something went wrong while processing the import. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
confirmation.canClose: You can close this window. The import continues in the background and you'll receive a notification when it's complete.

emptyState.title: No organizations yet
emptyState.description: Create your first organization to get started
